And<S>2532</S> unto the angel<S>32</S> of the church<S>1577</S> in<S>1722</S> Sardis<S>4554</S> write<S>1125</S>; These things<S>3592</S> saith<S>3004</S> he that hath<S>2192</S> the seven<S>2033</S> Spirits<S>4151</S> of God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> the seven<S>2033</S> stars<S>792</S>; I know<S>1492</S> thy<S>4675</S> works<S>2041</S>, that<S>3754</S> thou hast<S>2192</S> a name<S>3686</S> that<S>3754</S> thou livest<S>2198</S>, and<S>2532</S> art<S>1488</S> dead<S>3498</S>.
Be<S>1096</S> watchful<S>1127</S>, and<S>2532</S> strengthen<S>4741</S> the things which remain<S>3062</S>, that<S>3739</S> are<S>3195</S> ready to die<S>599</S>: for<S>1063</S> I have<S>2147</S> not<S>3756</S> found<S>2147</S> thy<S>4675</S> works<S>2041</S> perfect<S>4137</S> before<S>1799</S> God<S>2316</S>.
Remember<S>3421</S> therefore<S>3767</S> how<S>4459</S> thou hast received<S>2983</S> and<S>2532</S> heard<S>191</S>, and<S>2532</S> hold fast<S>5083</S>, and<S>2532</S> repent<S>3340</S>. If<S>3362</S> therefore<S>3767</S> thou shalt<S>1127</S> not<S>3362</S> watch<S>1127</S>, I will come<S>2240</S> on<S>1909</S> thee<S>4571</S> as<S>5613</S> a thief<S>2812</S>, and<S>2532</S> thou shalt<S>1097</S> not<S>3364</S> know<S>1097</S> what<S>4169</S> hour<S>5610</S> I will come<S>2240</S> upon<S>1909</S> thee<S>4571</S>.
Thou hast<S>2192</S> a few<S>3641</S> names<S>3686</S> even<S>2532</S> in<S>1722</S> Sardis<S>4554</S> which<S>3739</S> have<S>3435</S> not<S>3756</S> defiled<S>3435</S> their<S>846</S> garments<S>2440</S>; and<S>2532</S> they shall walk<S>4043</S> with<S>3326</S> me<S>1700</S> in<S>1722</S> white<S>3022</S>: for<S>3754</S> they are<S>1526</S> worthy<S>514</S>.
He that overcometh<S>3528</S>, the same<S>3778</S> shall be clothed<S>4016</S> in<S>1722</S> white<S>3022</S> raiment<S>2440</S>; and<S>2532</S> I will<S>1813</S> not<S>3364</S> blot out<S>1813</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> out of<S>1537</S> the book<S>976</S> of life<S>2222</S>, but<S>2532</S> I will confess<S>1843</S> his<S>846</S> name<S>3686</S> before<S>1799</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S>, and<S>2532</S> before<S>1799</S> his<S>846</S> angels<S>32</S>.
He that hath<S>2192</S> an ear<S>3775</S>, let him hear<S>191</S> what<S>5101</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto the churches<S>1577</S>.
And<S>2532</S> to the angel<S>32</S> of the church<S>1577</S> in<S>1722</S> Philadelphia<S>5359</S> write<S>1125</S>; These things<S>3592</S> saith<S>3004</S> he that is holy<S>40</S>, he that is true<S>228</S>, he that hath<S>2192</S> the key<S>2807</S> of David<S>1138</S>, he that openeth<S>455</S>, and<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> shutteth<S>2808</S>; and<S>2532</S> shutteth<S>2808</S>, and<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> openeth<S>455</S>;
I know<S>1492</S> thy<S>4675</S> works<S>2041</S>: behold<S>2400</S>, I have set<S>1325</S> before<S>1799</S> thee<S>4675</S> an open<S>455</S> door<S>2374</S>, and<S>2532</S> no man<S>3762</S> can<S>1410</S> shut<S>2808</S> it<S>846</S>: for<S>3754</S> thou hast<S>2192</S> a little<S>3398</S> strength<S>1411</S>, and<S>2532</S> hast kept<S>5083</S> my<S>3450</S> word<S>3056</S>, and<S>2532</S> hast<S>720</S> not<S>3756</S> denied<S>720</S> my<S>3450</S> name<S>3686</S>.
Behold<S>2400</S>, I will make<S>1325</S> them of<S>1537</S> the synagogue<S>4864</S> of Satan<S>4567</S>, which<S>3588</S> say<S>3004</S> they<S>1438</S> are<S>1511</S> Jews<S>2453</S>, and<S>2532</S> are<S>1526</S> not<S>3756</S>, but<S>235</S> do lie<S>5574</S>; behold<S>2400</S>, I will make<S>4160</S> them<S>846</S> to<S>2443</S> come<S>2240</S> and<S>2532</S> worship<S>4352</S> before<S>1799</S> thy<S>4675</S> feet<S>4228</S>, and<S>2532</S> to know<S>1097</S> that<S>3754</S> I<S>1473</S> have loved<S>25</S> thee<S>4571</S>.
Because<S>3754</S> thou hast kept<S>5083</S> the word<S>3056</S> of my<S>3450</S> patience<S>5281</S>, I also<S>2504</S> will keep<S>5083</S> thee<S>4571</S> from<S>1537</S> the hour<S>5610</S> of temptation<S>3986</S>, which<S>3588</S> shall come<S>3195</S> <S>2064</S> upon<S>1909</S> all<S>3650</S> the world<S>3625</S>, to try<S>3985</S> them that dwell<S>2730</S> upon<S>1909</S> the earth<S>1093</S>.
Behold<S>2400</S>, I come<S>2064</S> quickly<S>5035</S>: hold that fast<S>2902</S> which<S>3739</S> thou hast<S>2192</S>, that<S>2443</S> no man<S>3367</S> take<S>2983</S> thy<S>4675</S> crown<S>4735</S>.
Him<S>846</S> that overcometh<S>3528</S> will I make<S>4160</S> a pillar<S>4769</S> in<S>1722</S> the temple<S>3485</S> of my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> he shall go<S>1831</S> no<S>3364</S> more<S>2089</S> out<S>1854</S>: and<S>2532</S> I will write<S>1125</S> upon<S>1909</S> him<S>846</S> the name<S>3686</S> of my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the city<S>4172</S> of my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S>, which is<S>3588</S> new<S>2537</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>, which<S>3588</S> cometh down<S>2597</S> <S>2597</S> out of<S>1537</S> heaven<S>3772</S> from<S>575</S> my<S>3450</S> God<S>2316</S>: and<S>2532</S> I will write upon him my<S>3450</S> new<S>2537</S> name<S>3686</S>.
He that hath<S>2192</S> an ear<S>3775</S>, let him hear<S>191</S> what<S>5101</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto the churches<S>1577</S>.
And<S>2532</S> unto the angel<S>32</S> of the church<S>1577</S> of the Laodiceans<S>2994</S> write<S>1125</S>; These things<S>3592</S> saith<S>3004</S> the Amen<S>281</S>, the faithful<S>4103</S> and<S>2532</S> true<S>228</S> witness<S>3144</S>, the beginning<S>746</S> of the creation<S>2937</S> of God<S>2316</S>; <sup>of the Laodiceans: or, in Laodicea</sup>
I know<S>1492</S> thy<S>4675</S> works<S>2041</S>, that<S>3754</S> thou art<S>1488</S> neither<S>3777</S> cold<S>5593</S> nor<S>3777</S> hot<S>2200</S>: I would<S>3785</S> thou wert<S>1498</S> cold<S>5593</S> or<S>2228</S> hot<S>2200</S>.
So<S>3779</S> then because<S>3754</S> thou art<S>1488</S> lukewarm<S>5513</S>, and<S>2532</S> neither<S>3777</S> cold<S>5593</S> nor<S>3777</S> hot<S>2200</S>, I will<S>3195</S> spue<S>1692</S> thee<S>4571</S> out of<S>1537</S> my<S>3450</S> mouth<S>4750</S>.
Because<S>3754</S> thou sayest<S>3004</S>,<S>3754</S> I am<S>1510</S> rich<S>4145</S>, and<S>2532</S> increased with goods<S>4147</S>, and<S>2532</S> have<S>2192</S> need<S>5532</S> of nothing<S>3762</S>; and<S>2532</S> knowest<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> that<S>3754</S> thou<S>4771</S> art<S>1488</S> wretched<S>5005</S>, and<S>2532</S> miserable<S>1652</S>, and<S>2532</S> poor<S>4434</S>, and<S>2532</S> blind<S>5185</S>, and<S>2532</S> naked<S>1131</S>:
I counsel<S>4823</S> thee<S>4671</S> to buy<S>59</S> of<S>3844</S> me<S>1700</S> gold<S>5553</S> tried<S>4448</S> in<S>1537</S> the fire<S>4442</S>, that<S>2443</S> thou mayest be rich<S>4147</S>; and<S>2532</S> white<S>3022</S> raiment<S>2440</S>, that<S>2443</S> thou mayest be clothed<S>4016</S>, and<S>2532</S> that the shame<S>152</S> of thy<S>4675</S> nakedness<S>1132</S> do<S>5319</S> not<S>3361</S> appear<S>5319</S>; and<S>2532</S> anoint<S>1472</S> thine<S>4675</S> eyes<S>3788</S> with eyesalve<S>2854</S>, that<S>2443</S> thou mayest see<S>991</S>.
As many as<S>3745</S> <S>1437</S> I love<S>5368</S>, I<S>1473</S> rebuke<S>1651</S> and<S>2532</S> chasten<S>3811</S>: be zealous<S>2206</S> therefore<S>3767</S>, and<S>2532</S> repent<S>3340</S>.
Behold<S>2400</S>, I stand<S>2476</S> at<S>1909</S> the door<S>2374</S>, and<S>2532</S> knock<S>2925</S>: if<S>1437</S> any man<S>5100</S> hear<S>191</S> my<S>3450</S> voice<S>5456</S>, and<S>2532</S> open<S>455</S> the door<S>2374</S>, I will come in<S>1525</S> to<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> will sup<S>1172</S> with<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> he<S>846</S> with<S>3326</S> me<S>1700</S>.
To him<S>846</S> that overcometh<S>3528</S> will I grant<S>1325</S> to sit<S>2523</S> with<S>3326</S> me<S>1700</S> in<S>1722</S> my<S>3450</S> throne<S>2362</S>, even<S>2504</S> as<S>5613</S> I also<S>2504</S> overcame<S>3528</S>, and<S>2532</S> am set down<S>2523</S> with<S>3326</S> my<S>3450</S> Father<S>3962</S> in<S>1722</S> his<S>846</S> throne<S>2362</S>.
He that hath<S>2192</S> an ear<S>3775</S>, let him hear<S>191</S> what<S>5101</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> saith<S>3004</S> unto the churches<S>1577</S>.
